snippet: Matt Harvey had eight strikeouts in seven and two-thirds innings to produce the finest work of his still-brief career and help the Mets escape Cincinnati with a victory.
abstract: New York Mets beat the Cincinnati Reds, 8-4.
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey had eight strikeouts in seven and two-thirds innings to produce the finest work of his still-brief career and help the Mets escape Cincinnati with a victory.

headline.seo: Mets’ Harvey Pitches to Beat the Rain and the Reds
headline.main: Harvey Pitches to Beat the Rain and the Reds
headline.print_headline: Harvey Pitches to Beat The Rain and the Reds
